summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for, the purchase of the southeast quarter of the northeast quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 1, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M., for use in connection with the Firland Sanitorium; providing for payment for said property out of, and making an appropriation from, the General Fund, and (such purpose not having been specified in any tax levy or official estimate), declaring the emergency making necessary such appropriation, and placing the said property under the jurisdiction of the Department of Sanitation.
